item.title: Does Alcohol Really Boil Away in Cooking?
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: Does Alcohol Really Boil Away in Cooking? Looks like the answer may not be as clear cut as many had thought: A study conducted by the US Department of Agriculture’s Nutrient Data Laboratory calculated the percentage of alcohol remaining in a dish based on various cooking methods. After 2.5 hours of simmering there was still […]
item.content:encoded:
Does Alcohol Really Boil Away in Cooking? Looks like the answer may not be as clear cut as many had thought:

A study conducted by the US Department of Agriculture’s Nutrient Data Laboratory calculated the percentage of alcohol remaining in a dish based on various cooking methods.

After 2.5 hours of simmering there was still 5% alcohol remaining.
